about_the_game:
A group of high schoolers went on a supposedly fun road trip. Unbeknownst to them, they were brought to another dimension. Realizing something was off, and they decided to run away. What will happen to them?

2 V 6 Asymmetrical Multiplayer PVP*

In this game, you and up to seven other players will be randomly divided into two teams: 6 Humans and 2 Creatures.

Survive the Experiment!

As humans, you must escape the woods by hacking the system and avoiding being captured by creatures. As creatures, you must capture or avoid the humans to escape before the time runs out.

Diverse cast of Characters to Play with each Unique Skill

In this demo, you can choose to play between 3 Humans and 2 Creatures, each with unique skills and traits. More characters will be coming in the full version. Stay tuned!

Items to help your Mission

Humans can utilize basic items scattered in the maps or use Human Signature items that are tied to each character to finish the objective.

*in an ideal scenario

**All images taken from an alpha build of the game, art style, mechanics, and features may change in the future.

A group of high schoolers went on a supposedly fun road trip. Unbeknownst to them, they were brought to another dimension. Realizing something was off, and they decided to run away. What will happen to them?

2 V 6 Asymmetrical Multiplayer PVP*

In this game, you and up to seven other players will be randomly divided into two teams: 6 Humans and 2 Creatures.

Survive the Experiment!

As humans, you must escape the woods by hacking the system and avoiding being captured by creatures. As creatures, you must capture or avoid the humans to escape before the time runs out.

Diverse cast of Characters to Play with each Unique Skill

In this demo, you can choose to play between 3 Humans and 2 Creatures, each with unique skills and traits. More characters will be coming in the full version. Stay tuned!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Big Sur
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 dual-core 1,6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 617 or higher
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: Project Unseek Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/ 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 4000 or higher
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Project UNSEEK is a 2v6 class-based asymmetrical online multiplayer horror game inspired by 80s slasher horror movies, SCP urban legend, and Science Fiction, where you compete against each other to survive the experiment as High Schoolers or Mythical Creatures.
